name: Flipnote Studio™ 3D
description: Flipnote Studio 3D is an exclusive free download for members of My Nintendo to celebrate the launch of the service. In order to become a member and download it, you first need to create a Nintendo Account at https://accounts.nintendo.com. You have to do this either by signing in there with the Nintendo Network ID you use on your Nintendo 3DS system, or by linking that Nintendo Network ID in your Nintendo Account settings after the registration. Then just visit the Flipnote Studio 3D product page on the official Nintendo website while being signed in with your Nintendo Account, and you'll find the software ready to download to your Nintendo 3DS system. This offer is valid only until 30 April 2016, after which the software will become unavailable for download. You must be 13 years of age or older in order to register a Nintendo Account. Flipnote Studio 3D is a free drawing application that allows you to create your very own animated masterpieces. Whether you want to scribble quick notes or draw sketches, you’ll never run out of pages with Flipnote Studio 3D. There are a whole host of tools that will let you bring your creations to life and create high-quality animations. You can then share these creations with friends and users from around the world so everyone can be wowed by your talents.
